```{r}

library(tidyverse)

# Load aggravated assaul data
agg_crime_ca <- read_csv("crime-data-5100/Aggravated-assault-California.csv")

agg_crime_us <- read_csv("crime-data-5100/Aggravated-assault-US.csv")


# Load Homicide data
```
